"We shall see," she said, she whispered the question
to her bolts and thew them down on the ground in front
of the bot.  "Their pattern will tell all...hmmm...I
see you have a great power, it is the shadow of the
light that was your undoing...oh, and yes, I believe I
see something about Malice, but it's vague, allow me a
moment."

OOC: Sorry, I thought I sent it to the group.  Anyway,
how is Malice?

--- "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, Devouring"
<bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
> 
> "Then... Do you know if Malice is okay?  Tell me,
> will Malice return 
> to us?" the clone demanded.
> 
> 
> OOC:  Fortuneteller's player sent this to me instead
> of the group.  
> So here it is. 
> 
> Fortuneteller:
> 
> "I believe I may be able to asist you in your
> battle against Unicron," said Fortuneteller, "we
> Gypsyions have some ability to forsee what will be."
> 
> She knew she couldn't reveal the full extent of her
> power, but she COULD use it to gain their
> trust...and
> then backstab them.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
> <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > OOC:  Don't count Malice out yet.  Right now he is
> under Unicron's 
> influance, capable of anything.  Look to Ydrassil,
> Windlord, perhaps 
> Hydras or some other Pred.
> > 
> > 
> > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > At the word "brother" Fortuneteller began to
> > reconsider whether or not Malice was really a
> > potential father.
> > 
> > OOC: Somehow I read over all of Organics stuff,
> and
> > STILL thought he was a different guy. Do you have
> any
> > other suggestions for the father?
> > 
> > --- robert riley wrote:
> > > OOC: I don't see why not. When Leige Maximo
> bugged
> > > out, it was not really in use. It still retains
> > > knowledge, though not as much as the Autobot
> one. 
> > > Perhaps, he can get a boost of power from Vector
> > > Sigma...
> > > 
> > > Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> > > IC:
> > > "Thanks, but first, Malice..." Organics said,
> > > turning from the sky.
> > > 
> > > "Who is this 'Malice'? I have been here only a
> > > short time and every other sentance from you
> > > concerns this 'Malice.' Who is he?" Megatron
> > > Revived asked.
> > > "He is our brother. Neutronics changed his name
> and
> > > his soul, after he and I were seperated three
> > > hundred years ago. In the future anyhow. Can't
> you
> > > find him, with the Matrix?"
> > > The clone thought it over, then returned his
> answer.
> > > "I have not had it long enough, it has a limited
> > > range on whose spark I can see into. Only nearby
> > > Decepticons can I sense."
> > > 
> > > Kyle Stewart wrote:
> > > Fortuneteller smiled, "Perhaps I can help you
> > > there."
> > > 
> > > OOC: Is there any reason the Decepticon Matrix
> of
> > > Leadership won't work on him? Also, would the
> > > council
> > > please e-mail me the restrictions on the
> Deviners.
> > > 
> > > --- robert riley wrote:
> > > > OOC: A while back I did some research on such
> a
> > > > subject and found out Cybertron is about the
> size
> > > or
> > > > a little larger than our moon.
> > > > 
> > > > IC:
> > > > "Who knows," Organics said, still looking up,"
> he
> > > is
> > > > just as unpredictable as anything. I don't
> know
> > > how
> > > > we will get rid of him."
> > > > 
> > > > Kyle Stewart wrote:
> > > > OOC: I thought that Earth was smaller than
> > > > Cybertron,
> > > > and Unicron could eat that, albeit it took him
> a
> > > > little longer. Of course I just heard that
> from
> > > > someone else on this site, and if it's true
> the
> > > > Transformer people lack a sense of
> perspective.
> > > > 
> > > > BIC: "Well then why not just eat this
> continent?
> > > Or
> > > > this base for that matter?"
> > > > 
> > > > --- robert riley wrote:
> > > > > Organics:
> > > > > 
> > > > > The valkyrie walked over to the pilot.
> > > > > "Don't worry, he can't simply eat this
> world.
> > > He's
> > > > > too small!" she said with a small smile.
> > > > > She shifted her gaze up, and he smile faded.
> 
> > > > > "I hope they don't try to mind control him
> or
> > > > > something," she said softly," they would
> unleash
> > > > > more trouble than any of us can handle."
> > > > > 
> > > > > Kyle Stewart wrote:
> > > > > Fortuneteller sensed a strange destiny
> ripple
> > > with
> > > > > the
> > > > > name "Malice", he was at least a potential
> > > father.
> > > > 
> > > > > She would have to see if she could absorb

> > > > > destiny
> > > > > energy along with Organics.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Then she looked up at the sky. If Unicron
> was
> > > here
> > > > > she couldn't imagine the true extent of his
> > > > destiny
> > > > > energy, the power to snuff our worlds. It
> was
> > > more
> > > > > than she'd ever be able to absorb. While her
> > > > orders
> > > > > remained to take Organics', she would see to
> > > > taking
> > > > > at
> > > > > least a sample of Unicrons futures as well.
> > > > >

> > > > > >
